title: Guardians’ Code
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>Yohane-san......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It’s not Yoshiko, it’s Yoha... Oh, Setsuna.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I have a little secret that I want to tell you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Umm...... I’m kinda busy right now...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Understood...! Fallen Angel Yohane must prepare to invade the heavens, after all!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>That’s not what I meant...?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>We’d like to become Yohane-san’s guardians. In order for us to uphold our mission, I’ve come up with a code! Take a look!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>A code!? What’s this... Umm... “First, the guardians shall protect Fallen Angel Yohane. Second, the guardians’ mission must remain secret. Third, if the Fallen Angel’s forces are discovered, a prompt response must be made......” What is this? How many are there?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I wrote 18 of them.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>You’re fixated on that number...... Well done, Setsuna!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
